greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Trajectory of 277777788888899 under "x -> product of digits of x" map.
comment: This is the smallest number of persistence 11 (cf. A003001). It is conjectured that no number has persistence greater than 11.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, The persistence of a number, J. Recreational Math., 6 (1973), 97-98.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 12 2006
ext: Edited by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 05 2010
